synopsis.text: Yamato Yura, a timid freshman at Stella Women's Academy, finds herself thrust into an unexpected world of excitement and camaraderie when she stumbles upon the C3 club, an after-school group dedicated to playing survival games with airsoft and BB guns. The club, whose name stands for Command, Control, and Communication, is filled with enthusiastic members who are passionate about military memorabilia and war games. Led by her charismatic roommate and club president, Sonora Kashima, Yura is introduced to a hidden side of herself as she becomes increasingly drawn to the thrill of the game. As she navigates her way through this new world of friendly fire and battle strategies, Yura must find a balance between her desire for a normal high school life and her growing love for airsoft. Will she be able to rise to the challenge and become the sharpshooter the C3 club needs, or will the excitement of the game lead her down a path of self-destruction? Join Yura and her friends as they embark on exhilarating adventures in Stella Women's Academy, High School Division Class C3.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
